subtasks.subtask: Pick up the white plastic cup.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The white plastic cup needs to be moved to the location of the paper cup numbered 1.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to pick up the white plastic cup.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The gripper might not be able to securely hold the cup if it's too slippery.
subtasks.solution: Ensure the gripper is properly calibrated and adjusted for the cup's material before attempting to pick it up.

subtasks.subtask: Move the white plastic cup to the position of the paper cup numbered 1.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The white plastic cup needs to be placed in the location of the paper cup numbered 1.
subtasks.move: move forward and place the cup down.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to place the white plastic cup in the desired location.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The cup might slip or fall off the table during the placement process.
subtasks.solution: Ensure the table surface is stable and the gripper is securely holding the cup before placing it down.
